alert.note: Alert for White Pine (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 17 at 12:29PM PDT until July 17 at 2:45PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of northeast Nevada, including the following county, White Pine. * WHEN...Until 330 PM PDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1227 PM PDT, Satellite shows a nearly stationary storm producing heavy rain showers from thunderstorms in the advisory area. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Robinson Summit. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
